milestone_title: Case for Change v1 finalized (technical + narrative)
milestone_description: Internal v1 that summarizes key pathways/risks, data gaps, and a recommended campaign strategy.

milestone_title: Submit coalition comments on draft corrective action/post-closure permit
milestone_description: Finalize and submit permit comments (technical + legal) with clear asks (surface water sampling, emerging contaminants, HHRA/PPP).

milestone_title: Decision-maker map + pressure box v1 complete
milestone_description: Identify key decision makers, pressure sources, and opponents; assign ownership and next steps.

milestone_title: Secure agency commitment to surface-water sampling requirement
milestone_description: Written commitment (ADEM/EPA or permit language) to implement surface-water sampling in Barge Canal/Hog Bayou pathway.

milestone_title: Field plan executed: sampling event(s) completed and QA/QC validated
milestone_description: Complete at least one sampling round; results validated; summary shared with partners and decision makers.

milestone_title: Publish results + recommended corrective action pathway
milestone_description: Public-facing memo + internal technical appendix; includes next permitting/legal actions and community asks.

milestone_title: Final permit/corrective action decision includes measurable protections
milestone_description: Final conditions adopted (monitoring + reporting + enforceable corrective actions) with clear metrics and timelines.

milestone_title: Community access roadmap for Hog Bayou (concept to commitments)
milestone_description: Define feasible access options (easements/blueway/park concept), responsible parties, and a funding approach.
